channel.title: Else without if(NEED HELP)
channel.description: How do i fix this problem? [code]else if(itemUsed == 24 && useWith == 113) {[/code]

item.title: Else without if(NEED HELP)
item.dc:creator: @Taylor_John0 Taylor John0
item.description:
@Taylor_John0 wrote:

Orphaned case, Illegal start of expression, I was adding a skill to my server and this is what cause the error.

[code]else if (itemUsed == 24 && useWith == 113)
{
if(playerLevel[25] >= 0)
{
deleteItem(24, getItemSlot(24), 1);
deleteItem(113, getItemSlot(113), 1);
addItem(1917, 1);
addSkillXP(100, 25);
} else {
if(playerLevel[25] <= 0)
{
sendMessage(“You need 0 Drink Mixing to make beer”);
}
}
//end Drink

				else if (itemUsed == 1511 && useWith == 946) {
				if(playerLevel[9] >= 0) {
					deleteItem(1511, getItemSlot(1511), 1);
					addItem(50, 1);
					addSkillXP(15, 9);
				} else {
					sendMessage("You need a fletching level of 0 to make this bow.");
				}
			}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Else without if(NEED HELP)
item.dc:creator: @LoveScaper LoveScaper
item.description:
@LoveScaper wrote:

[quote=“Taylor John0, post:3, topic:122574”]Oh yeah, I was trying to fix a different else if, not paying attention, now I get orphaned case, how do i fix it?

if(itemUsed == 1511 && useWith == 946) { if(playerLevel[9] >= 0) { deleteItem(1511, getItemSlot(1511), 1); addItem(50, 1); addSkillXP(15, 9); } else { sendMessage("You need a fletching level of 0 to make this bow."); } }
That’s what the compiler is referring to.[/quote]change to this if (itemUsed == 1511 && useWith == 946) { if (playerLevel[9] >= 0) { deleteItem(1511, getItemSlot(1511), 1); addItem(50, 1); addSkillXP(15, 9); } else { sendMessage("You need a fletching level of 0 to make this bow."); } } and mak e sure it in right spot

Read full topic
